com.isotrol.impe3.freemarker
Interface FreeMarkerService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractFreeMarkerService, DefaultFreeMarkerService
public interface FreeMarkerService

IMPE3 Interface to the freemarker templating engine.

Author:
Andres Rodriguez

Method Detail

createModel

Model createModel(RenderContext context)
Creates a new freemarker model with the default functions.

Parameters:
context - Render context.
Returns:
A new model with the default functions.

decorateRenderModel

void decorateRenderModel(RenderContext context,
                         TemplateModel model)
Resolves objects deferred to the rendering phase.

Parameters:
context - Render context.
model - Model to resolve.

getFragment

HTMLFragment getFragment(String template,
                         RenderContext context,
                         Locale locale,
                         Object dataModel)
Encapsulate the processing of a FreeMarker template in a HTML fragment.

Parameters:
template - Template to process.
context - Component rendering context.
locale - Locale to use or null to use the locale provided by the render context.
dataModel - Data model to use as input.
Returns:
A HTML fragment encapsulating the processing of the template.
Throws:
NullPointerException - If the provided locale is null.

getFragment

HTMLFragment getFragment(String template,
                         RenderContext context,
                         Locale locale,
                         Object dataModel,
                         freemarker.template.ObjectWrapper wrapper)
Encapsulate the processing of a FreeMarker template in a HTML fragment.

Parameters:
template - Template to process.
context - Component rendering context.
locale - Locale to use or null to use the locale provided by the render context.
dataModel - Data model to use as input.
wrapper - FreeMarker object wrapper to use.
Returns:
A HTML fragment encapsulating the processing of the template.
Throws:
NullPointerException - If the provided locale or object wrapper is null.

                         RenderContext context,
                         Object dataModel,
                         freemarker.template.ObjectWrapper wrapper)
Encapsulate the processing of a FreeMarker template in a HTML fragment.

Parameters:
template - Template to process.
context - Component rendering context.
dataModel - Data model to use as input.
wrapper - FreeMarker object wrapper to use.
Returns:
A HTML fragment encapsulating the processing of the template.
Throws:
NullPointerException - If the provided locale or object wrapper is null.

process

void process(String template,
             RenderContext context,
             Locale locale,
             Object dataModel,
             Writer output,
             freemarker.template.ObjectWrapper wrapper,
             boolean safeMode)
             throws Exception
Process a FreeMarker template (low-level method). In case of an exception in safe mode, the exception (offline) or an empty string (online) will be written to the output before rethrowing the exception.

Parameters:
template - Template to process.
context - Component rendering context.
locale - Locale to use or null to use the locale provided by the render context.
dataModel - Data model to use as input.
output - Output writer.
wrapper - FreeMarker object wrapper to use (optional).
safeModel - Wthether to use safe mode.
Throws:
Exception - If an exception occurs during template processing.
